text: You could use a SQS system in AWS or other so that if a message takes too long, it sends a “I’m thinking…” message and then reposts the response when it is ready. Essentially have HubSpot send a webhook to an AWS Lambda function that adds your message to a queue, and if it takes say 15 seconds with no response yet, return a message, then your queue will continue to run the real response call in the background

I don’t know the IP stuff specifically but have you looked at this?

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks/validating-requests>

May help you double down on security
